caption: A beautifully designed space with delicious, fresh seafood and tasty cocktails. Could spend an entire evening here every week with ease.

The oysters, blue points, Kumamoto, and beau soleils were fabulous. The clams and shrimp likewise delicious. The fried chicken also hit the spot, as did the drinks Victor made. Victor is a super excellent host. Aims to please and very professional while treating us like family. The person or persons in the kitchen are great. And let me mention that their playlists are quite good for all age groups. Will definitely return. Victor is a gem.
The wine and oysters are AMAZING. My friend and I wanted wine and oysters we ended up getting 24. The service is next level. Victor was so attentive and kind. Highly recommend stopping by.
So happy to have found this place! Great food and service.
Friendly staff, great food, and quaint yet beautiful interiors. Highly recommend if you're looking for fresh oysters and great outdoor seating!
this place is the best oysters in williamsburg I recommend the lobster roll ceviche fried chicken and rybeye steak very beautiful place is small but with excellent service and very very fresh food

Great music , excellent drinks, delicious food (you must try their oysters) fantastic staff, what else can you ask from a restaurant ? .This is so far my “favorite place “ to relax after work .. the place is vey cozy and invite you to stay ... Great job The Royal family !!!!!

This place is amazing, I’ve had so many good meals here as well as some great times. Staff is great, super friendly. Some of the best Mexican food in all NYC, their minchiladas are fire!!! PLEASE STOP BY AND SUPPORT LOCAL BUSINESSES!

My friend and i were looking for an oyster bar. It has been challenging finding oyster bars with variety since the pandemic. Look at a few places and took a closer look at this place and called. Spoke to Victor who very friendly on the phone. He convinced us of the 3 varieties of oysters he had to serve. We decided to take a chance and try this place. When we got there, we almost passed it since it was dim inside and outside. The is barely a sign, but good places are like that. Victor opened the door for us and I identified myself, he was very welcoming!! We sat down and he already knew from our phone. He had 3 types of oysters; Kumamoto, Irish Point and Hood Canal. All 3 were good, our #1 preference was Irish Point. They were delicious. Victor had us get about 3 dozen of the oysters because they were so good.  The proseco he served us was crisp and dry and delicious.  Everything was going smoothly.  Then another patron told us about the crab toast,  and again it hit the point.  Victor took really good care of us all night.  Oysters are not cheap,  but that night I did not care because everything was going well that night. This place is truly a gem, fresh food, great host and friendly patrons. These are a great combination to have a great dining experience! Make sure Victor is there to really enjoy your time!
Delicious food and oysters plus a perfect michelada. Owner is so friendly and attentive. Had a great time!

We love this place. The food is spot on, always. Cocktails-muah! Service is great. Friendly. They opened right before COVID shutdowns. Thankfully, they made it to the other side. We're hoping this stays a neighborhood fixture for a while. And, they can keep the magic.

(Translated by Google) A very cozy place good service good drinks and a fantastic chicken, delicious shrimp tacos very rich and a special quesadilla, I will definitely return🍴🍹😍  (Original) Un lugar muy acogedor buen servicio buenos tragos y un pollo fantástico, tacos deliciosos de camarones muy ricos y una quesadilla especial, definitivamente voy a volver🍴🍹😍

(Translated by Google) My favorite place to go out to dinner, delicious food, very good drinks and the service is the best in the whole city. I go every week and whenever I have friends They come back because they love it !!!  (Original) Mi lugar favorito para salir a cenar, comida deliciosa, bebidas muy buenas y la atención es la mejor de toda la ciudad. Voy todas las semanas y siempre que llevo amigos Vuelven porque les encanta!!!

What a wonderful restaurant! The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. The kitchen accommodated a few tweaks to our dishes. And the food was great. We ordered the seafood tower, burrata appetizer and nachos-all were good sizes and tasty.
Excellent food everything is delicious my family love this place very friendly staff 👏👏👌🏻 thank you "The Royal seafood bar"
This place slaps. Great mix of seafood and Spanish food
Amazing oysters
Great food, great drinks and fantastic owners and staff. We love this place and go at least twice a week... sometimes five. Six stars if I could.
Best oysters, amazing burritos, incredible drinks  & awesome vibes 👏⚡️👏
The seafood is nice and fresh tacos are amazing great friendly customer service, Totally recommend it
Passed here during phase two and it must have just opened. AMAZING drinks and oysters, reasonable price, friendly staff. Super satisfied.
Food is great, good price, tasty drinks!
delicious food
